description: Node that retrieves attribute(s) from IDM and stores them in the Node State

attributes.description: A set of attributes to collect from IDM
attributes.title: Attributes to retrieve

identifier.description: The attribute used to identify the the object in IDM.
identifier.title: Identity Attribute

keyInStateOrObjectAttributes.title: Identity Attribute present in NodeState or ObjectAttributes

objectLookup.description: The identity resource in IDM that this node will search
objectLookup.title: Identity Resource

updateObjectAttributes.description: Whether to store the key in the ObjectAttributes object in NodeState
updateObjectAttributes.title: Store in ObjectAttributes
